entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
